content: <ce:simple-para id="sp0050" view="all">Synthesis of {[Ag<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>(bpp)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>(H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>]·[(H<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>BO<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>)<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>(CO<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>)·2H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O}<ce:inf loc="post">n</ce:inf>(<ce:bold>1</ce:bold>): A mixture of Ag<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (116 mg, 0.5 mmol), bpp (205 mg, 1 mmol) and Na<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>B<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">5</ce:inf>(OH)<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>·8H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (382 mg, 1 mmol) was stirred in CH<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>OH–H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O binary solvent (10 mL, v/v, 1:1) under ultrasonic treatment (160 W, 40 kHz, 40°C) in air for 15 min. Then, an aqueous NH<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf> solution (25%) was dropped into the mixture to give a clear solution. The resultant filtrate was allowed to evaporate slowly in darkness at ambient temperature. After one week, colorless plate crystals were obtained in 22.8% yield (based on Ag). They were washed with small volumes of cold CH<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>OH and diethyl ether. Anal. Calcd (%) for C<ce:inf loc="post">27</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">44</ce:inf>Ag<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>B<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>N<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">16</ce:inf>: C, 34.91; H, 4.77; N, 6.03. Found: C, 35.40; H, 4.85; N, 6.11. Selected IR peaks (cm<ce:sup loc="post">−<ce:hsp sp="0.10"></ce:hsp>1</ce:sup>): 3425(s), 3069(w), 2932(w), 2863(w), 1609(s), 1422(s), 1346(m), 1220(m), 1070 (m), 1007(m), 807 (m), 706 (w), 612(m), 512(m).</ce:simple-para>
clean_text: Synthesis of {[Ag2(bpp)2(H2O)2]⋅[(H3BO3)3(CO3)⋅2H2O}n(1): A mixture of Ag2O (116 mg, 0.5 mmol), bpp (205 mg, 1 mmol) and Na2B4O5(OH)4⋅8H2O (382 mg, 1 mmol) was stirred in CH3OH-H2O binary solvent (10 mL, v/v, 1:1) under ultrasonic treatment (160 W, 40 kHz, 40°C) in air for 15 min. Then, an aqueous NH3 solution (25%) was dropped into the mixture to give a clear solution. The resultant filtrate was allowed to evaporate slowly in darkness at ambient temperature. After one week, colorless plate crystals were obtained in 22.8% yield (based on Ag). They were washed with small volumes of cold CH3OH and diethyl ether. Anal. Calcd (%) for C27H44Ag2B3N4O16: C, 34.91; H, 4.77; N, 6.03. Found: C, 35.40; H, 4.85; N, 6.11. Selected IR peaks (cm-1): 3425(s), 3069(w), 2932(w), 2863(w), 1609(s), 1422(s), 1346(m), 1220(m), 1070 (m), 1007(m), 807 (m), 706 (w), 612(m), 512(m).
